text: I still love doing what I do, and I'm really lucky to get up in the morning and want to go to work.
author: Heston Blumenthal

text: It seems to me madness to wake up in the morning and do something other than paint, considering that one may not wake up the following morning.
author: Frank Auerbach

text: Now, on nights that I can't sleep, I play video games alone until the morning.
author: Namie Amuro

text: In West Virginia, the most vulnerable people we have are people who get up every morning and go to work.
author: Joe Manchin

text: She got the magazine on a Wednesday morning, and on Thursday announced our marriage was over.
author: David Gest
